#summary Installing the application.

= Introduction =

I will quickly summarize how to install this app.


= Details =

  # Check out the source.
  # Compile it in eclipse/JDK
  # Copy the .class files & the property file to your home path.
  # IF you want to move it somewhere else please modify the runscreen.sh first line to reflect the new path.
  # Add the contents of crontab file to your crontab _(crontab -e)_
